content.detailedDescription: On sept 26th 2009 i was in milford, new hampshire just west of manchester. i was with a friend of mine. we are both highly experienced commercial airline pilots with almost 60 years and 40 thousand hrs of flight experience between us. around noon time my friend called me excitedly to the outside of the garage we were working in. he pointed high up in the sky to the northeast of milford towards a position i would have to say was very nearly overhead the city of manchester. as i looked i saw an object that had to be at an altitude of 70 to 80 thousand feet in altitude hovering over the manchester area.(please keep in mind that we are both experienced pilots used to making accurate judgements of an object's altitude.) it was spherical in shape and a greyish silver color. this object hovered stationary for some 30 to 40 minutes. i have seen high altitude weather ballons and i know that it would be impossible for a weather balloon at that altitude to remain perfectly stationary for even a few seconds even on the calmest of days as for the idea of a helicopter, the object's altitude rules that out.(most helicopters can't hover out of ground effect much above 10 thousand ft. cerainly none at 70 to 80 thousand ft.) we both watched the object for 30 to 40 minutes and then watched it takeoff to the northeast at such a high rate of speed it almost appeared to vanish. i don't know what this was but i'm pretty damn sure what it wasn't and so is my friend.
content.summary: Stationary sphere at high altitude above south central nh

content.detailedDescription:
These are a string of events which i witnessed at first and experienced later and i believe are related to the kecksburg, pa. sightings and subsequent crash reported in 1965 pennsylvania. you'll see as this factual story developed over the next 2 and a half years (!), the events associated with what i witnessed didn't stop merely with what i witnessed on december 9, 1965.  on that date, i was 16 yrs. old and living with my family @ 183 hillcrest blvd., hoffman estates, illinois, called by the locals there "the hoffman highlands". (i am now 60 yrs.Old, and live in vermont). the address which was then 183 hillcrest blvd., is now about 560 hillcrest blvd. due to the subsequent housing development there.  i had a friend, eberhard becker who lived on harvard ln. and whose street curved around to meet with hillcrest blvd.  

the event:  i was riding my bicycle home around 4 pm. from my friend's place on harvard ln.  i saw above our house on hillcrest blvd. a silent fireball with a long 'tail' behind it, and moving at a slow rate of speed...Much slower than, say, a meteor or ball-lightning.  it actually moved as though it was being somehow controlled, exhibiting a 'flight' of sorts in its trajectory.  i was "mesmerized" to the point that i actually drove my bike into a large dirt-mound on the side of the road near the end of harvard ln., skinning my legs and elbow upon hitting the ground.  i stood for 4 or 5 minutes as this fireball continued towards what at the time i thought may eventually go into lake michigan.  also, being relatively close to o'hare airport, i also thought that this may have been a jet-liner which caught on fire and was going to crash.  i recall that i told my folks what i had just seen, and also the next day was intent on looking in the newspaper to see if anything had been reported, watched the local news...And, i didn't rule out that this may have been a ufo of some sort which was experiencing some serious problems.  however, i was dismayed to find that there were no reports anywhere of even so much as a sighting, let alone a crash of anykind. (!) at that point i just put what i had seen "on-the-back-burner"...Not thinking very much about it thereafter...But remembering it for the rest of my life as being an unusual sighting...I never forgot about it for it 'moved' me tremendously in curiosity and emotionally, and quite decisively.

all this, please keep in mind, until i saw the history channel's report of the kecksburg incident, and what surely must've been what i saw...However...Unbeknowns to me at the time and subsequently, even stranger events were to unfold which are, in my minds eye now anyway, and related to the kecksburg incident, even stranger yet...And practically defy considerations of mere 'coincidence'!

now...Here comes the strange part.  in january, 1968, just over 2 years later i enlisted in the us army.  i went through boot-camp at ft. leonardwood, mo.  i became a fairly lowly clerk-typist, despite the fact that due to my excellent standing in my boot-camp and ait scores, they wanted me to go airborn rangers.  i declined.  i was told by my recruiter that he'd make sure that i would go to japan and other asian countries, which he said would also most probably include viet nam as well, as most young folks back then ended up there eventually anyway!  well, it turned out that despite the war and all, my permanent station ended up being none other than the norad radar installation at oakdale, pa. (which was the installation called to cordon-off the sight of the kecksburg incident a mere 2+ years earlier and collect all the materials there!!!) (!!!)  see where this is going? 

:-)  not only that, but they took me first, at the norad sight, out of my clerk-typist vocation, and told me i'd be much better off working there as a draftsman up "on-the-hill" in the norad radar building itself...But, as draftsman!  and...That's not all...One morning as i was walking to my post in the radar building, the brigadier general lloyd l. leech, commander of the post was walking down the hill and directly in my path.  i stopped and saluted him sharply as was required, and continued up to my station.  about a half-hour later, his general's aide was in my office, and stated that the general wanted to see me. keep in mind, i am only at this point a private first class...Not very high-up on the scale.  i thought, "man, i must've screwed-up something...?"  upon arriving in the general's office, i was told to go right in.  the general bid me to sit for a moment or two, which i did.  he then said..."my specialist first class aide is about to deploy to a different assignment, and i want you to be my aide.  my aide will contact you with the details of this assignment.  i was immediately given a dod secret clearance...And became the general's aide!

so anyway, in view of what i recently saw on the history channel, and stories of "men-in-black" keeping tabs on civilians and their progress through society and other related things...It is odd to say the least, that what i saw going through the late afternoon sky in december, 1965, and where i ended up, and the way events throughout my life unfolded relatively quickly and have continued to unfold subsequently in my life, i thought maybe someone there where you are may find this interesting, or possibly put more together where this incident at kecksburg is concerned.  i have ended up working in government jobs ever since, building nuclear submarines with a secret clearance, and now am being considered for a job with the aerospace industry and the corning corporation milling lenses for satellites, telescopes and lasers...Also for the us government.  ...And "the 'hits' just keep on coming", as it's said. :-)  just thought you there at mufon may find all this to be of a 'particular-type of coincidental nature'.  it sure seems that way to me.

please feel free to contact me if you feel further investigation or elaboration may be necessary.  thank you...

richard babcock
content.summary: Fireball headed in south-southeasterly direction, slight arching in trajectory

content.detailedDescription: Circular type object, seam to change shape that reminded me of some thing on fire. object moved slowly. it had strange reflective properties, that looked similar to a fire in that the light from it simmered or reflected like a fire. but at same time wasn't. it moved in straight lines forward and reverse an east and west. object also floated in one spot. object slowly headed north until it was a small yellowish red orange ball shape and then with a blink of the eye was gone. several people in omaha nebraska said they also saw it. omaha is 40 miles south of the location i was at. as my wife and i watched it a couple of people joged by us chasing is thing. these two men said they had been watching it for about 30 minutes.  the whole experence was strange and exciting. i still think of this often. i have seen other odd thins in the sky before but never for a 15-20 minute period.
content.summary: We were at camper my wife and i along with several other people also seen  it.

content.detailedDescription:
My boyfriend, russell,and i were standing in our small suburban backyard enjoying the clear morning. we had been up all night hanging out with 2 friends of ours. they were in our living room at the time of our sighting. 
 i spotted a white reddish pulsating orb high in the north-eastern  sky. i pointed and said to russ, " what is that?" he looked and started to say "oh thats just a plane but  said after a moment instead "i don't know, what is that?" then it started  moving slowly from north-east toward the eastern quarter of our house. as it got closer we were able to see 3 smaller orbs connected to the larger orb. then it started moving west directly over our heads!!! surrounding the orbs was a very large, clearish, flat craft or ship. as a whole! but it was clear, we could see light glimmering very subtly off of it, and it radiated a trail of "heat-like" substance behind it- also clear.     the ufo stopped completely over russell and i for about 45 seconds, the light in the middle pulsated reddish white and greenish white..All we could hear was a very low octave drone coming from the stealthy craft.....When it hovered over us, we went from amazement to feeling paralyzed in fear for a moment...We felt completely vunerable and  at the mercy of this advanced ariel craft.  all i could do was murmer,"oh my god russell, what are we looking at????!!!,'' we felt scared and in shock. the craft then continued on toward the west. making all the neighboring dogs bark frantically.
the entire experience lasted about 5 minutes...Or less, it's hard to tell...It seemed like forever!

i then went inside to get our friends to come outside and see it...But when they came out it was to far away for them to see it. i will never be the same. it was beautiful!
content.summary: Beautiful, amazing, humbling, it felt personal, like it was waiting for me to come outside and notice it, it was really large and like nothing i had ever seen before.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing in front of my house with my ex husband, waiting for my son to come back downstairs so we could go to the bank. as i was waiting and conversing with my ex i looked up directly above, left of my house and saw two birds flying in tandem cicles together which is what hawks do but what struck me as strange was that one was a hawk and one was a crow so i said to randy in amazement "look at that, isn't that strange one is a crow and one is a hawk." he looked ,./said yeah and shrugged it off. well as i continue to watch them fly together in this stange way i see something in my perepherel vision coming from the left. it wasn't to far to the left of the flying birds and it was just a little above them closing in on their location slowly. i watched it fly right over them and continue on towards dyer mountain range and i watched til i could not see it anymore. it made no noise. nothing came out of the back of it. the birds were not bothered by it and the part i found the strangest is that it wasn't much bigger than the birds. there were no lights nor windows or anything like that. no identifying marks of any kind it just looked smooth, solid, black, small.
content.summary: Very small cigar shaped, black, silent, slow moving

content.detailedDescription:
I am a school bus driver.  i had just finished dropping off my last student for one school, and was on my way to another school.  i had thirty minutes before the second school students were released, and it would only take seven or eight minutes to get there.  i was proceeding eastbound on e. contessa street in the residential area just northwest of the intersection of n. greenfield road and e. university drive when i noticed a black object or spot in the air due north of my location.  it appeared to be in the climb-out path of runway 22 of falcon field airport.  i stopped my bus in the intersection of e. contessa street and n. orlando for a better look, and determined that the object was stationary in the sky at approximately a 25 or 30-degree angle above the horizon.  it was featureless black and mostly round, though the edges were not sharply defined in my eyes.  (note:  i have a slight double-vision problem; traffic light one or two blocks away appear to be two lights side-by-side; aircraft in flight appear to have two wings or two fuselages depending on the angle at which they appear from my position.)  i could not see the double-vision effect in this case, however -- the edges of the object just appeared to be poorly defined.)  i considered the possibility that this was an inflated black garbage bag floating around and changing shape slightly, but it seemed to be locked solidly in one position, unmoving, and was too black -- i.E., it was much blacker than a distant black object should have been given the intervening hazy atmosphere.  (also, the weather was a high thin overcast.)  i continued on to n. greenfield road and turned left, or northbound.  as i drove northbound a light aircraft was observed climbing out of falcon field from my right to left and it passed apparently between me and the object, though it did not pass directly in front of the object.  the aircraft then made a climbing turn to the right, apparently passing to the west of the object.  i don't know if the pilot saw the object or not.  at the time i was monitoring 124.6-mhz, the control tower frequency of falcon field (i am a student pilot), and while i was not paying a lot of attention to the radio traffic i did not hear any excited transmissions or anything indicating the control tower personnel was aware of the object.  as i drove north at 45 mph there was an optical illusion of the object seeming to get lower on the horizon as though it was moving away from me faster than i was approaching it.  yet, when i stopped for traffic lights, the object was still unmoving and still at 25 to 30-degrees above the horizone, and had not gotten any smaller or larger, and did not appear any closer or farther away.  however, it had seemingly moved slightly to the west, so it was now north-northwest of me.  the angle above the horizon, and its size, and it degree of blackness did not change as i traveled three miles north from where i originally saw it -- in other words, i did not appear to be getting any closer to it; i was not getting under it, it's position relative to me seemed unchanging in all respects.  at one point i saw a woman standing on the curb on the east side of greenfield with a cellphone to her ear, and she was looking in the general direction of the object, but i don't know if she was looking at the object.  the intersection of n. greenfield road and e. mcdowell road was the three mile point from where i started, and as i drove the last half mile or so from there to the 202 freeway, the object did move further to the west and began to get smaller.  when i turned east on the 202 the object was north-northwest of me and getting significantly smaller.  as i proceeded east on the 202 i looked back over my left shoulder and lost sight of it as the freeway dipped into a trench, but when the freeway climbed out of the trench again i caught a glimpse over my shoulder of a very tiny black dot in the distant north-northwest.  a possibility, though i seriously doubt it:  mcdonnell-douglas manufactures the apache helicopter on the north side of falcon field and it is not unusual to see dark olive-drab and other helicopters flying patterns in the area.  it could be claimed that the object i saw was a helicopter.  i seriously doubt it, however, because 1:  i never saw any flickering of rotor blades; 2:  it was stationary at all times when i stopped at three different traffic lights, yet i never got any closer to it and the angle above the horizon never changed even as the azimuth changed more and more toward the west after i crossed mcdowell.
p.S.  i was a field investigator for apro in the 1970's in australia, but the last case i paid any attention to was the travis walton abduction case after i returned to the u.S.  this sighting generated in me the same feelings that caused me to eventually give up on ufo sightings:  most of them didn't make any sense:  even extraterrestrial spacecraft couldn't do what many sightings reported if they had any physicality at all.  this was more like a hole into our space from another dimension -- and that doesn't explain it either.  so, there it is, for whatever it is worth.
content.summary: A black spot stationary in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was getting ready to go to bed and was going to step out on patio to pray and give my thank you to god for blessing me with another day. i do this every night, and i always look up at the stars for at least a minute just looking at space, i have seen maybe 7-8 shooting stars or comets burning up since we moved here a year ago, there is no way it was anything like that. so i was opening the sliding glass door to step out and as i was doing this i saw a huge white light lower then a duel prop plane that staggered by earlier that night pretty sure it was a c-130, i love the military always watch nellis jets and choppers all the time when they go by. this light was by far the brightest thing i have ever seen in the sky, i could kind of see a faint light from the sphere in the center, then that was surrounded by a huge glowing halo of white light, then i stepped out and started really looking at it for about 15 seconds. at which point the whole thing looked to be zooming off into space, not decipitating or burning out, it looked to be completely staying that same size but moving out and away into space, is the best way i can describe it. it seemed as i watched it go out i saw this all the way til it was just a point of light in the sky that looked like all the stars in the sky, exept i stood there and watched it completely disappear.
content.summary: A  ridiculously big sphere with bright white light with it that moved into space in seconds

content.detailedDescription: I had gone out the side dor of our house to play in the side yard.It wasn't quite dark yet. the side yard overlooks our hayfield. i had turned to look down into the field when i saw a disc shaped object moving slowly up the field towards the house. i wanted to run in to tell my family, but couldn't move. i tried to scream but nothing came out. the disc came up the field within 100 ft of the ground.The lights were flashing one at a time clockwise aaround the egde.As it got closer, i could see the lights were recessed into the edge and the disc was a grayish black color. as it got closer,it seemed to get lower. it flew over a large tree in the side yard,almost hitting it,then it was gone. as soon as it was out of view,i ran into the house to tell my family. as soon as i got into the door, my mom started yelling at me that i had missed dinner and wanted to know where i was. i tried to exlpain that i was in the side yard, but that got her even madder. she claimed to have yelled out the side door for me several times, my dad backed her up.I looked at the clock,it showed a half hour later then when i had gone out. to me the whole incident, from when i went outside to coming back in was under five minutes.
content.summary: Disc shape with round lights flashing around the edge going clockwise.

content.detailedDescription:
Got home from work noticed a bright light in the west(maybe 10 miles away) w/ the setting sun.
went to tell my mom and dad they came out to see but not too concerned.
cleaned up put on clean clothes went to town and drove out to see it.
it was very close hovering above the ground (maybe 100') no noise just hovering w/ bright lights.
then it took off w/ a high rate of speed w/ military jets following it but they could not keep up and it flew towards the northeast.Never heard any more about it. told people about it they thought i had too much to drink or just laugh. ther was other people who stopped but they were down the highway on the shoulder on us 62.
content.summary: Triangle in shape ,bright.With lots of lights

content.detailedDescription:
This is my first close incounter with a ufo. but not my last. i have seen a disk shaped ufo and a triangle ufo so close i could hit them with a rock. i've only told 2 people these storys in the years since i've seen them for obvious reasons. 

it all started one night when my neighbor and i snuck out at night to walk around town and cause trouble. we lived in a small town of about 300 residence. we hadn't evan gotten off our small dead end road when we herd a noise coming from the river which runs parallel to our road. the ice was cracking. we thought i moose or bear was coming our way so we started running back to my house. the noise of the ice cracking seemed to be following us. then sudenly the noise stopped and a disk shaped object with lights and colors swirling around it flew out from the woods by the river. it was flying at tree top level about 150 feet in front of us and it made no noise. it looked like it was flying about 5 mph. it didn't look as big as i thought a ufo would be. it looked to be about 25 to 30 feet wide and about 10 feet tall. it flew off still at about 5 mph continuing to go east untill we couldn't see it anymore because of the trees. we both stood there not moving as we watched it, knowing we were seeing something that no one would ever belive. we went back to my house after this which is about 30 feet from the objects flight path. we stayed up all night from the adrenalin rush talking about what we saw.

since this day i've seen 4 other ufos
content.summary: A friend and i herd a noise while walking near a river and then a ufo flew away at tree top level

content.detailedDescription:
Very clear & cold night. could even see the milky way. camping with my 2 sons and another boy. kids were in the tent sleeping & i sat on the passenger side in the car to read, occasionally turning on the engine to warm up. inside light was on. all of a sudden a strong wind blew in. engine stopped & lights went out. i looked around. all looked calm. then i looked up & saw a mushy white metalic craft above the little hill i was parked next to. there were 5 or 6 dark windows on its side.  i got scared & did not leave the car.  i looked at the tent which seemed ok (next morning the main pole & 3 side pegs were out & rope was twisted tight in a counter-clockwise position). the color of the craft reminded me of mica. i felt tense & helpless & scared. i know i sensed a time loss & have no recollections.  at some time i remember looking up at the craft for a moment (several seconds) when it suddenly silently flew out of sight. then it appeared over the vast strip-mine area, bobbing into sight &  out of sight in the darkness. from a distance it appeared brighter than when it hovered over my car. it was around 6:30 am when i went to the tent & asked the boys if they heard anything. they did not. i noticed that the ground had counter-clockwise wind evidence i'd experienced.

i drove to the mine office to meet a geologist from greensboro who was going to work on geology merit badge with the boys this day. while waiting i spoke to the owner & told my story. he didn't want to hear it. he thought i was nuts. when we returned to charlotte i told my wife. she thought i was nuts. a few people i told also questioned my sanity, so i kept it to myself...Until i read about george fawcette (lincolnton,nc) in a news article a couple of years later who was an expert on ufo sightings. i reported the story to him by phone & learned nc has many sightings & i wasn't nuts after all. now that history & discovery channels frequently discuss the topic i don't feel like the lone ranger. i talk about it now if people are interested.

but i don't talk about my behavior after that incident...Frequent sightings of sorts & an obsession to watch the skies at night...Street lights frequently going out...A slight bump on my neck i noticed. in 1993 the bump was removed by dr. ken xxxxxx in charlotte along with a few growths in my scalp. the pathology report identified the growths but could not identify the metal removed from my neck. since that procedure nothing unusual has ever happened again & lights don't go out, i don't feel a presence or see ufo activity anymore. i definitely don't talk about it to anyone. this is the first time. one time a cynical person asked me if i felt "special".  no! it's random. a ufo sighting made me a believer who can't ever forget the fear of that encounter & a gnawing feeling embedded in me forever. we have a lot to learn & accept.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Heavy momentary wind shook car, engine stopped,lights went out. i looked around & saw object hovering above me.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
Since december 25,2009 to the present day february 28, 2010, i have been taking pics outside over my house and in each pic there are multiple lights, spheres,circles,cones,and even flame-like teardrop  colors. craft
appears to be very large and transparent with human-like people inside at what appears to be computer terminals,pics are very detailed, although,
most objects appear on pic while using the flash. there appears to be smaller sphere shaped objects that dart around separate from large craft
( exact size unestimable ) some are green and white circular, some are
multi-colored almost rainbow colored, also i have seen these craft go from hover to the speed of a shooting star ( 3 times ). i have 100's of pics.To many to make a clear, definitive description. has happened nearly every night from christmas night to present. what caught my eye at first were small flashes of light and round spherical objects moving at high rate of speed ( west to east, north to south, all directions )i had no clue what these things were or are. the first pic i took on christmas night, there was 1 round green and white object, quite high in the sky directly over my home. since that photo, i obviously became interested and curious and began taking photos nightly, and most nights i capture
images that are quite curious. i was very afraid the first time i saw this object, because i had no idea what the heck it was. the larger object appears to hover and possibly maybe only rotates slowly in a clockwise circle, the smaller spheres dart about as if in practice
mode or so it appears. pics submitted are of the single disc photographed on christmas night.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.shape: Circle,   Diamond,   Disc,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Teardrop
content.summary: Was taking pics at 10 pm est and object appears to be very large, with multiple lights, spheres,circles,and human like people inside.

content.detailedDescription:
My husband & i were camping in western utah, blm land, in the desert in our camper. it was early evening and dark & we noticed flashing colored lights on the horizon, by the la sal mountains, about 15 miles from us. it was just weird to see that so far away & so low and where there would be no traffic. then the next morning, a plane flew over us in that direction, very low, it was a c130 plane. thats' about it. it's just that about 19 years before that when we were camping in pikes peak nat'l forest colorado with our boys, we all were looking up at the sky at night & saw at least 3 or 4 very fast flashing lights high in the sky, crisscrossing and kept it up. but they were so fast & moved in different directions so fast it was just unbelievable and we didn't know what that was. we all saw them go across the sky for about 1/2 hour to an hour. saw them the next night too. that was before we had ever even heard about how the ufo's are fast & change directions fast also.
it was different to see the lights down low on the horizon unlike up in the sky like we had 19 years ago but they seemed like the same.
content.summary: Saw fast moving lights on horizon while camping.

content.detailedDescription:
Upon reviewing my ham radio photos a few weeks ago, i noticed a disc in the picture, to the right of my tower. the picture was taken with a new casio camera, model ex-s770, 7.2mp. i took 3 other pictures prior to this one using different asa settings to test it out.
this was the last picture i took of the series and the only one showing the disc. the photo was taken looking north east at approx. a 45% angle. my lat. is 40 degrees, 11 min and 36 seconds north. the long. is 75 degrees, 4 min. and 1 second west. all i know is that my tower is crystal clear and i have no idea as to what this disc is.The movement can be seen from its start, a dark circular area until lens closed. the forward and upward movement had to be very fast.Thhe disc also shows a bright outside and green inside.
i am 63 years old and have been into photography since i was 12. this is the first time i ever caught, what i think is a u.F.O.
i must admit, that i started believing in them when i was stationed in colorado springs after vietnam. my friend that lived in the same apartment as i was stationed at norad in the air force. he told me about tracking mach 7 ufo's making right hand turns etc. they always received hundreds of calls after they saw the sightings on radar.
tim eisner
wn3uca@aol.Com
content.summary: Forward and upward movment of disc. oct. 22,2007 @17:33:20

content.detailedDescription:
earlier this month in february, i was at newnan high school softball field with my father filming my sister as she took batting practice. my intention was to make a short video that college softball coaches could view. i filmed many homeruns that day and as i was getting in the truck to leave, i decided to review the footage. as i was viewing one of my sister's homeruns i noticed something strange. 
     i filmed the ball as it hit the bat, but i lost sight of it for a moment. later i found out that this was because she hit a pop up. i moved the camera upward towards the sky and caught an object that i thought was the ball in my view. to my amazement the object took off towards the outfield extremely fast and at one point seemed to move horizontally over the light pole and over the tops of the trees across the road behind the ball field(the road is an extra 100 feet towards the trees). the object showed no signs that it was descending and flew at speeds that i've never seen an aircraft fly at.
     i reviewed what i had filmed later on that night at home on a bigger screen and i found that i could prove that the object was not a softball. (it goes without saying that neither my sister nor anyone else i know could hit a ball that far.)as i examined the video, i found that i had actually captured the ball on film falling to the ground in the outfield. at this point i was baffled. i ruled out any birds or airplanes due to the fact that they did not match the speed or the shape of the object.
     i eventually made the batting video and i also made a seperate video of the unidentified object. i used what tools i had on windows movie maker to create a video with slow motion clips and also a sharpened picture. interestingly enough the sharpened view seems to indicat the object gave off some type of gas or air or some other type of disturbance in the sky. i am not an expert so i am not ruling out that this could just be a side effect of the program.
     i do have a video and i will be including it in my report. i have not altered the film in any way except to provide a slow motion version and a sharpened view after the raw footage. i was using a hi 8 video camcorder. the footage was filmed on an 8 millimeter tape and converted to dvd using a sony video to dvd converter and ripped from dvd using "softwaredepo dvd ripper". i think you will find this footage significantly interesting. 
     my name is joseph craig garmany. i am 19 years old and i might have witnessed a ufo. thank you for your time. i hope to hear back from you.
content.summary: Circular object flew over the softball field that i was on.

content.detailedDescription: My father came barreling in from work one afternoon and told my family to walk to the back of the house. he said he had left work because he had seen a huge blimp heading in the general direction of our house/property. my family and i (5 sisters and myself) walked to the back of the house and there over a big plowed field 30-40 feet from the ground was this huge, lumbering, turquoised object. it appeared to be 3-4 stories tall and probably 300 yards in diameter(circular in appearance). the circular object was making a mild humming sound. my family wasn't the only ones to see the ufo. there were cars on both sides of the road as far as the eye could see in both directions of our house. the road runs north and south and visibility was half a mile in either direction. i remember seeing the flash of camera bulbs so someone in our area has pictures. i was probably 4 to 5 years old at the time but i have verified what i've seen with my older sisters. whom tell pretty much the same story. the ufo lumbered overed the field as if it was moving in slow motion and after what seemed to be forever, disappeared out of sight. my father's work place was located on hwy. 11(runs north and south). the object was moving in an easterly direction. he said he saw smaller objects dropping out of the ufo but said the ufo was at a higher altitude when he saw it, at his place of work. our house is 20 miles from oak ridge national laboratories(ornl) and this sighting may have something to do wth the fact of that..... close proximity to a weapons grade facility. i would also like to add that our local newspaper reported the following day that it was a weather balloon. if anyone would like to research the story of the weather ballon they can search the newspaper archives. the newspaper is 'the dailey post athenian'. the time frame would be 1972-1975.
content.summary: 300 yards wide and 3-4 stories tall and blue/green mixture in color and hovered over a plowed field effortlessley

content.detailedDescription: We were 1 mile south of jim bridger power plant 27 miles east of rocksprings 8500 feet elevation it was star bright no moon yet we did not need flashlights . we were looking at the sky talking about how the sky looked totally clear stars bright by the billions . when all 7 of us at once noticed a large rectagular craft about a1/4 mile wide and 1/2 mile long (may be larger ) . it flew over us at about 5 mile perhour at less than 400 feet . it had a rotation beacon in the center no windows the bottom was dull black  . it flew directly over the power plant . no down blast no sound yet we felt a vibrating sensation persons present were myself , shawn whittman , larry thornberry cheslie bolton, sherill love and one other couple . we did not report the event fear of reaction ..
content.summary: Witnessed craft fly slowly overhead.

content.detailedDescription:
This thing in the sky lasted for about an hour,i checked it with the side
of the building and it stayed in the same place.It might have been a weather
ballon but in the area where i saw it there wasn't any weather stations
that i knew of. the reason i saw it was because i had some pigeons behind
my girlfriends house and i was alwys looking skyward. the object stayed in
the same place for over an hour.I wasn't sure what it was.When i came out
later it was gone. i looked for it every day after that and never saw it again. if it was a weather baloon i figued it would appear again at the
same time. the address of the house in kyoto was 10 higashi fukunokwa
okazaki kyoto, japan.I'm not sure of the date but it was in the summer.
the area was in the city and consisted of regular houses.
content.summary: While stationed in kyoto, japan i saw something in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way home from work. there was a traffic jam on the highway way out in the suburbs approx. 20 miles from philadelphia. my friend and i were sitting there when i mentioned to him that i had seen a tv show about ufo's the night before. he laugh and said that stuff is all bull.I mentioned that i believed in ufo's. and at that time i looked up in  the sky and said you see that shiny object above us, that could be a uforight there, he laugh. i told him to look, he refused. i looked again, thinking it was just a helicopter reporting the traffic jam. so i told to look again, he refused. i looked again while it was just sitting there. it hadn't moved. i begged him to just take a look again he refused .So i looked once more and it took off at a incredible speed and dissapered. i was in the 101st airborne and flew in choppers all the time. i know for a fact that a helicopter does not move at such extreme speeds.At that time i had no idea what that object could have been. the object was silver and round and had no markings on it at all.
content.summary: A silver object in the sky above.

content.detailedDescription: It was approx. the time and date described above, i was living in a 2 story victorian in pacific grove ca, in the 80's i grew up in this house, i was 19 years old at the time being born in 1966, i have never related this sighting to anyone, and as per the usual reasons i'd be labeled crazy or stoned or on drugs! but after watching "i know what i saw" on the history ch. i had to relate this! i'm not exactly shure of the exact date but i know it was before the space shuttle blew up by a few months so it must have been 1985, at approx. 11:00 p.M. i was upstairs in bed looking out the window counting stars and enjoying the milky way, the night was crisp and very clear with a light wind, after a while i lit a cigarette and for some reason i decided it was too late to smoke so i put it out, within several minutes i returned looking out to the stars, and as i did i noticed what looked like a satalite moving from east to west approx. then i noticed it was bright red in color, yet it was as high in the atmosphere as satalites travel, having seen several that night, but this one was just weird, being red as a street light, so i opened the window and sat on the sill, to make shure the old victorian glass was not playing tricks on my eyes, as i watched this object travel west i then noticed another object moving east same size yet this object was blue bright blue! now i saw close encounters of the third kind as a kid in a san antonio tx. theatre as a kid and dismised ufo's as hollywood stuff although the air traffic scene sent chills down my spine, i still was a true non-beliver in ufo's. in any event as i watched this red object move towards what looked like a collision course with this blue object, i had to wipe my eyes in disbelief, was i really seeing this? then i thought it might be a product of the space program nasa ect. and as i watched these objects meet they both stopped dead still high up in the apmosphere and just stood there for about 5 seconds it looked like they had docked, and i told myself this is impossible at the speed they were moving and then just coming to a halt? after the 5 seconds of stillness they suddenly split apart at phenominal speed at oblique directions they moved so fast i could only track one so i made a decision to track the red object it flew out of sight over my house and out of sight in about 3-4 seconds! now what kind of spacecraft can do that? to this day i have never heard of something sighted or reported that matches this, if anyone at mufon can shed any light on what i saw back in 1985 i'd like to know, it has bothered me ever since, because i have tried to find a simple awnser to this and have found nothing, i'd hate to go to my grave without ever knowing what i saw that night. now there are really only 3 awnsers to what i saw, 1 it was a strange undocumented atmospheric annomly, 2 these were some sort of top secret man made craft, although i find that hard to swallow, because of their flight ablilties, 3 the big one there are not of this earth! any help on what i saw?
content.summary: High atmosphere objects

content.detailedDescription:
a colorful ring of lights hovering over someones house, then it moved away making no sound over the trees...

i was in clinton ms. standing outside a friends house in her driveway talking. we were in a residential neighborhood.It was dark out. about 8:00pm. there were houses accross the street from us. very close. while chatting with my friend i looked accross the street. and i glanced up, up above a house accross the street. there were tall trees directly behind this house. and what i saw was a ring of lights in a circle. it was very large, bigger than a couple houses put together. the lights were different colors, they were very bright alsmost glowing. they were in a horizontal plane above this house, just sitting there. and i said what the heck is that, well putting it nicely. my friend said i dont know. i said thats not normally there, and she said no. and i said its not making any sound. it was close enough we should have heard some sort of noise . i mean it was directly accross the street from us. i said well it cant be a balloon becuase a balloon would have fire, and would not be out at night anyway. then all of the sudden it started moving. it was almost directly over the house accross the street from us, and directly above the trees. it started moving away from us. there was no sound. it was so strange. anything that big, should have made noises, and that close. it did not move up it went sideways , horzontally. away from us. almost as if it knew we were looking at it. before it moved it was just sitting there above the trees, then it just started moving , away from us. so i said lets get in the car and chase it , and get another look, but by the time we went around the block , it was gone. i thought about calling the police, but said noone would believe us. so ive only told a few people about this, and most people say they believe me. scince this happened to me, im always watching the skys. hoping to see something again. i feel very lucky to have seen this thing, just wish i had a camera, but its forever etched in my mind.
content.summary: A ring of colorful lights in a circle or disc shape.

content.altitude: Treetop, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
The object looked like a normal flickering sphere of light seen at about 1215am on the 28th of feb 2010 until about 1;30 when clouds obstructed further viewing, but it seemed to be flickering in a manner that it was going thru some type of communication sequence.  i took video using a blackberry curve smartphone with 5x zoom...It can be seen pretty clearly in the video.  i used carson binoculars 80x zoom to get a better look and noticed that the object appeared to be moving from side to side, up and down, sideways but within a very small field of view in my binoculars, so with the naked eye it looked stationary.  occasionally changing colors and shapes (circular to boomerang and back to circular, but occasionally a line of smaller orbs or something) while dimming, glowing and then brightly lighting

there appeared to be another identical object due west of san antonio  and it appeared to be moving west away from san antonio and sinking lower and lower on the horizon.

5 minute video available upon request
content.summary: Flickering intense whitish blueish redish sphere that moved very fast but within a confined space, like a ball bouncing around in a box, sw sky toward carrizo springs texas

content.detailedDescription:
The event took place in beaver creek state park gretchins locks area.
it was a daylight sighting at extrmely close range + or - 200 ' 
the saucer made no sound when obseved. 
we observed saucer for approximately 30- 60 seconds.
it was disc shaped with opposing saucers top and bottom with apparent ports? arranged around circumference in center line seperating saucer segments.
color was what is today called champaign on autos.A polished titanium color.Rare for the time period.
 
 the location was in an area no longer public accessable approximately
one mile behind the old mill facility directly over the creek in the valley.This is a remote area accessable at the time by a one lane dirt road,the area had been used as public hunting at the time.
we were a group of high school friends who went there to camp for the weekend.We were all seventeen years old preparing for our senior year in high school.
there were two of us at the site at the time of the sigting.Myself and another male.
we had all gone to the site with camping gear the third member of our group left to go to a girl friends and returned after dark.
we were setting up camp appoximately between the hours of 6:30 and 7:30 pm
we had selected a site which was approximately 75' from the creek in a valley with hills behind us to the north and in front to the south.As we were setting up a loud crack( which was discovered to be tree tops breaking)startled us and we turned and looked behind us and up.The craft
came into view sliding on the tree tops bending them as it traveled.It exited the trees to cross the creek valley traveling at very low speed and traveled directly over our position slightly foreward, we were looking s.E.Direction.It made no sound.The craft was no higher than 200'
from the ground.It was an un obstucted view as it crossed the creek valley which took between 30 and 60 seconds, it re engaged the trees on
the hill in front of us and disappeared from sight.
i turned and said to don "did you see that?" his reply was "yea but i'll
never admit it!".He finally did, thirty years later.By this admission 
i decided to make a formal report of the very close range sighting in daylight.It was literally close enough to hit with a thown object.
 the craft was apporximately 100'wide.It was opposing saucer segments
arranged top and bottom with what appeared to be ports in semetrical spaced distances arranged around the center ,approx.Three feet apart.
the ports appeared to be clear,which enabled a view of the interior.
 the only object visable appeared to be a human or humanoid standing in
the foreward end of the craft , holding what appeeared to be control sticks,one in each hand.The color of the craft was a polished titanium
with no emblems.
 the fact that it left the trees on one side of the valley and re engauged them after crossing the open valley made it appear to be trying 
to avoid being sighted.We would not have seen it if it had not caused the noise of breaking the upper limbs of the trees, allerting us.As it crossed the open air above the valley it made no noise.There was no vapor trail
or any sign of exaust made by conventional propulsion systems.There was no
sign of plasma surrounding the craft,no visable distortion of the atmosphere surrounding the craft.
content.summary: Daylight sighting , 2-300 ft from saucer  riding on treetops ,believed to avoid detection

content.detailedDescription:
My family lived in mariemont,ohio, on top of a bluff over looking the little maiami river valley. my grand mother took me for a walk in the evening, down to a concourse, that over looked the valley to the south of us towards lunkin airfield. my grand mother pointed the object out to me. it was a glowing white ball with two tear shaped objects following it, with the thick end closest to the sphere.One atop of the other, they changed color as it moved,the ball was always white. the tear shaped objects went from yellow to blue and orange every two secounds. it made no sound.
it traveled in a slow movment from west to east and appeared to be at the same level as we were.
it was reported to be a mass haluciation for some 40,000 or so people. my grand mother and i did not mention that we had seen it. i was'nt very old at the time only 8 or so. i have never heard it mentioned as one of your sighting. i am not sure of the exact date because i was so young at the time. surley there must be some record of it, in the news papers archives.
content.summary: A round ball with two tear drop shaped objects behind it.

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing with my friends on the back porch of my home and we saw a bright blue light in the sky behaving strangely.  it bounced around, mainly up and down, almost crossing paths with a commercial airplane at one point.  this went on for over 20 minutes, we attempted to take photos with our phones and eventually got the video camera and got footage of it's actions.  
it's behavior was certainly not that of any aircraft we have seen before and it dimmed and brightened throughout the event.  we eventually went inside after not being able to identify it.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright bluish light in sky

content.detailedDescription: I was on google moon(sounded cool), being that i am incredibly interested in extra terrestrial life i quickly noticed perfect shaped saucers, as i zoomed in i was very suprised at what i saw(quickly grabbed my camera). some were divided into sections with lights on the end, some were just normal perfect saucers,then i saw about 12 hovering near each other. i showed my astronomy(30 years+ teaching/working with nasa) teacher the pictures i got the next day and they blew his mind, hes an obvious believer, being he talks about the "mother ship" and says the truth is out there every time a ufo is brought up.
content.summary: Must see!!!! saucers on moon

content.detailedDescription: I want to start out to explain this is not my photo, but a friend of mine that posted it on facebook. but i am a paranormal investigator. when she took the picture, she saw or heard nothing. she didn't know anything was even on the photo till she posted it and i saw it on there because she never really looked at it except in a thumbnail form. when i saw it i was floored. i have never seen a picture that clear of a real unidentified object caught on camera. the girl that took the photo was working part time at the stadium that night. the picture was either taken on 2/11/2010 or 2/12/2010. that was then north texas got that record breaking snow fall in 24hrs. ever. it was like 12 to 14 inches. i'm not sure of the event that they had their that night, but as you can see in the photo the parking lot had pretty much cleared out. i was hoping this photo could be further analyzed. i'm sure it was taken with your basic $100 digital camera.
content.summary: Round disk shape over cowboys stadium in arlington, tx.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to work at 5 am, when i saw 4 lights in an arrow form...2 lights on one side, 2 lights on the other. i kept driving and  when i looked up again the lights were moving. interweaving as if they were raving for a few seconds, then they spread out in a straight line and disappeared one by one.
content.summary: Started as triangle then the 4 lights started moving then straightened out and dissapeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was at work at hardees near the git n go market and zaxbys on buffalo road in clinton. i was on brake with one of my friends, ther wer werkers remodeling the git n go thay wer putting the roof over the gass pumps whin i noetised thim pointing up in the sky. the object was falling out of the sky at an aingel. it was big, about a hafmile long. it had no wings or fins it came to two points like a cigar. i thought it was a bom but it made no sound. it made no atempt to pull up if it wer a plain. and ther is no landing strip in clinton just hills. it came down behind the krystals sighn back twords the ford dealership. it disapeard into the side of a hill. thear was no exploshen or smoke. i drove to the spot and thear was no trace. me and my fried was in shock it was if the ship wint into the ground. i did not think about ailens until that day. now i believe.
content.summary: Big silver object falling blue sky no sound

content.detailedDescription:
Took a photo from my nokia 6131 phone, we were on vacations, later when downloaded to my computer saw this strange bright light on the top right corner.

at the time the photo was taken i did not notice anything in the sky, the location is in an open park called san martin near mendoza capital, in argentina.
content.summary: Took a photo from my cel phone and saw this later
